<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> LoadedValSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(LoadedTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the store and reload are the same size, we can always reuse it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoredValSize == LoadedValSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pointer to Pointer -&gt; use bitcast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoredValTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ab03652069eab17006c51f00c261a6a44">isPtrOrPtrVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp; LoadedTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ab03652069eab17006c51f00c261a6a44">isPtrOrPtrVectorTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StoredVal = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a932f08e32ea37a7019902ee467beb268">CreateBitCast</a>(StoredVal, LoadedTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert source pointers to integers, which can be bitcast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoredValTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ab03652069eab17006c51f00c261a6a44">isPtrOrPtrVectorTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TypeToCastTo-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ab03652069eab17006c51f00c261a6a44">isPtrOrPtrVectorTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cast to pointer if the load needs a pointer type.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loaded value is smaller than the available value, then we can</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StoredVal = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a932f08e32ea37a7019902ee467beb268">CreateBitCast</a>(StoredVal, StoredValTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a big-endian system, we need to shift the value down to the low</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits so that a truncate will work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.isBigEndian()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t ShiftAmt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeStoreSizeInBits(StoredValTy).getFixedValue() -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeStoreSizeInBits(LoadedTy).getFixedValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StoredVal = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StoredVal, ConstantInt::get(StoredVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), ShiftAmt));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Truncate the integer to the right size now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;NewIntTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a14f7b4f1aed38192fb6b7772eb506bdb">IntegerType::get</a>(StoredValTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a909eca4ba9e5eefc203c8e3770bdab25">getContext</a>(), LoadedValSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StoredVal = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ade4ee38419ac3921c718b634571033e4">CreateTruncOrBitCast</a>(StoredVal, NewIntTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadedTy != NewIntTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the result is a pointer, inttoptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadedTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ab03652069eab17006c51f00c261a6a44">isPtrOrPtrVectorTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StoredVal = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a53541ed6f92b18419f937f1f969aa0f6">CreateIntToPtr</a>(StoredVal, LoadedTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, bitcast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StoredVal = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a932f08e32ea37a7019902ee467beb268">CreateBitCast</a>(StoredVal, LoadedTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(StoredVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StoredVal = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5e655fd99a56d50b071fc26d8db5fd5b">ConstantFoldConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StoredVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function is called when we have a memdep query of a load that ends up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// being a clobbering memory write (store, memset, memcpy, memmove).  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// means that the write &#42;may&#42; provide bits used by the load but we can&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sure because the pointers don&#39;t must-alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check this case to see if there is anything more we can do before we give</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// up.  This returns -1 if we have to give up, or a byte number in the stored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// value of the piece that feeds the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vncoercion/#a1cdc82521ee78a15e2ca179d740a5049"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vncoercion/#a1cdc82521ee78a15e2ca179d740a5049">analyzeLoadFromClobberingWrite</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;LoadTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LoadPtr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WritePtr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          uint64&#95;t WriteSizeInBits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loaded/stored value is a first class array/struct, or scalable type,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t try to transform them. We need to be able to bitcast to integer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vncoercion/#aba537117d2f8896a17f972d29824ee13">isFirstClassAggregateOrScalableType</a>(LoadTy))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t StoreOffset = 0, LoadOffset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;StoreBase =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3ac5d9eb48038aa973017317279eadf5">GetPointerBaseWithConstantOffset</a>(WritePtr, StoreOffset, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LoadBase = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3ac5d9eb48038aa973017317279eadf5">GetPointerBaseWithConstantOffset</a>(LoadPtr, LoadOffset, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoreBase != LoadBase)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t LoadSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(LoadTy).getFixedValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((WriteSizeInBits &amp; 7) | (LoadSize &amp; 7))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t StoreSize = WriteSizeInBits / 8; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert to bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LoadSize /= 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Load isn&#39;t completely contained within the stored bits, we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have all the bits to feed it.  We could do something crazy in the future</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (issue a smaller load then merge the bits in) but this seems unlikely to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// valuable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoreOffset &gt; LoadOffset ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StoreOffset + int64&#95;t(StoreSize) &lt; LoadOffset + int64&#95;t(LoadSize))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we can do this transformation.  Return the number of bytes into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store that the load is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadOffset - StoreOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function is called when we have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// memdep query of a load that ends up being a clobbering store.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;DepSI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;StoredVal = DepSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst/#a89caf38fb409b0217360689351f3b457">getValueOperand</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vncoercion/#a43ab95f8d1cfe32b5c75a4d4d666d89c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vncoercion/#a43ab95f8d1cfe32b5c75a4d4d666d89c">getStoreValueForLoadHelper</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SrcVal, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;LoadTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;Builder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a909eca4ba9e5eefc203c8e3770bdab25">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If two pointers are in the same address space, they have the same size,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we don&#39;t need to do any truncation, etc. This avoids introducing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ptrtoint instructions for pointers that may be non-integral.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a3b996fbf8458aafffc86cb98a68d0a47">isPointerTy</a>() &amp;&amp; LoadTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a3b996fbf8458aafffc86cb98a68d0a47">isPointerTy</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getAddressSpace() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(LoadTy)-&gt;getAddressSpace()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return scalable values directly to avoid needing to bitcast to integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// types, as we do not support non-zero Offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ScalableVectorType&gt;</a>(LoadTy)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected a zero offset for scalable types&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t StoreSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()).getFixedValue() + 7) / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t LoadSize = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(LoadTy).getFixedValue() + 7) / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute which bits of the stored value are being used by the load.  Convert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to an integer type to start with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ab03652069eab17006c51f00c261a6a44">isPtrOrPtrVectorTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aae2c1bf70058f3665edaec525457030c">CreatePtrToInt</a>(SrcVal, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getIntPtrType(SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac6d28a9b11139182134a9618028a0d07">isIntegerTy</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a932f08e32ea37a7019902ee467beb268">CreateBitCast</a>(SrcVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a14f7b4f1aed38192fb6b7772eb506bdb">IntegerType::get</a>(Ctx, StoreSize &#42; 8));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift the bits to the least significant depending on endianness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftAmt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.isLittleEndian())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShiftAmt = (StoreSize - LoadSize - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#42; 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftAmt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcVal = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(SrcVal,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                ConstantInt::get(SrcVal-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), ShiftAmt));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadSize != StoreSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SrcVal = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ade4ee38419ac3921c718b634571033e4">CreateTruncOrBitCast</a>(SrcVal,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = LoadTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a909eca4ba9e5eefc203c8e3770bdab25">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t LoadSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(LoadTy).getFixedValue() / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(InsertPt);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know that this method is only called when the mem transfer fully</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// provides the bits for the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memsetinst">MemSetInst</a> &#42;MSI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;MemSetInst&gt;</a>(SrcInst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memset(P, &#39;x&#39;, 1234) -&gt; splat(&#39;x&#39;), even if x is a variable, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// independently of what the offset is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Val = MSI-&gt;getValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadSize != 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a0032ae544ae429aaf1053767da90426d">CreateZExtOrBitCast</a>(Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a14f7b4f1aed38192fb6b7772eb506bdb">IntegerType::get</a>(Ctx, LoadSize &#42; 8));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OneElt = Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Splat the value out to the right number of bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBytesSet = 1; NumBytesSet != LoadSize;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can double the number of bytes set, do it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumBytesSet &#42; 2 &lt;= LoadSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ShVal = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Val, ConstantInt::get(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), NumBytesSet &#42; 8));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Val = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab61be8e3cf17e9848aeeeabacfa1b09a">CreateOr</a>(Val, ShVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumBytesSet &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise insert one byte at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ShVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(Val, ConstantInt::get(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), 1 &#42; 8));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumBytesSet;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
